Help: Board layout for the Time Machine: Jazz Age edition.

types.Help: Payday, Hospital, Unemployment and SpringBreak are the corner squares.
Payday, Hospital, Unemployment and SpringBreak are the corner squares.
Payday, Hospital, Unemployment and SpringBreak are the corner squares.
Payday, Hospital, Unemployment and SpringBreak are the corner squares.
A square where the player can expect to lose points (cash, fame or happiness) or a salary cut.
Travel by rail on the Union Pacific Railroad or NY Central. Travel backwards to the nearest station of the same company is permitted.
A player may enter an occupation after meeting the requirments.

layout.name: Payday
layout.action_text: Collect Salary as you pass PAYDAY. Collect DOUBLE if you land here

layout.name: IncomeTax
layout.action_text: If salary is: $3,000 or less no tax. $3,001 to $10,000 pay 15%. $10,001 to $200,000 pay 50%. $200,001 or more pay 90% of 1 years salary

layout.name: Bootlegger
layout.action_text: Must have $1,000 to make vehicle modifications, or Bootlegging experience

layout.name: ShopWoolworths
layout.action_text: May spend up to 1 year's annual salary for the latest Crossley Radio. Score 1 Heart for each $1000 spend, or lose 1 for 'just looking'

layout.name: RooseveltCollege
layout.action_text: Must have $500 tuition. Degrees available: Business Admin, Dance, Engineering, Government, Law Enforcement, Medicine, Music, Theatre

layout.name: Hospital
layout.action_text: You are LAID UP until you throw 5 or less, or pay the Doctor or Paymaster 1/2 your salary for experimental drugs

layout.name: DonateNow
layout.action_text: The Class of 1929 is having a fund drive and call on you to donate your fair share. Throw 1 die to find out how fair. Pay the number thrown time $1,000 OR OR go to Unemployment if you can't or refuse to contribute.

layout.name: SapphireRecords
layout.action_text: Must have $1,000 for internship, or Business Admin Degree, or prior experience

layout.name: MajorLeagueBaseball
layout.action_text: Must have: $500 for batting coach; or MLB experience

layout.name: CarPayment
layout.action_text: Pay 1/4 your annual salary for car payment and maintenance

layout.name: PaulWhitemansOrchestra
layout.action_text: Must have: $500 to perfect Stride Jazz Piano, or a Music degree, or prior band experience

layout.name: buy_experience
layout.action_text: It's the Depression and experience is hard to come by: 1 - $3,000; 2 - $6,000; 3 - $9,000; 4 - $12,000

layout.name: Unemployment
layout.action_text: You LOST YOUR JOB and must throw 7, 11, or doubles to move on, OR pay 1 year's Salary for additional training.

layout.name: PayRent
layout.action_text: Pay half your annual salary for this years rent OR go to Unemployment if you can't afford the rent or refuse to pay.

layout.name: ProhibitionAgent
layout.action_text: Must have: $8,000 for special training, or Law Enforcement degree, or prior experience

layout.name: BeatProhibition
layout.action_text: Beat the Prohibition deadline by stocking up now on your favorite booze! Throw 1 die to find out how much booze. Pay number thrown times 10% of your cash-on-hand.

layout.name: CottonClub
layout.action_text: Must have: $1,000 for dance lessons, or a dance degree, or Cotton Club experience

layout.name: BuyProtection
layout.action_text: May buy 'insurance' from the Chicago Outfit to protect for your cash, Happiness and Fame. Cost of protection $5,000.

layout.name: ConeyIsland
layout.action_text: You vacation to Coney Island! Collect 6 Hearts for landing here and 3 each time you stay with a roll of 7 or less

layout.name: Horseracing
layout.action_text: Roll 2 dice to bet on the trifecta at Pimlico. 6 or less - lose $1,000 x roll of 1 die. 7 - Collect $10,000. 8 or more - collect $1,000 x roll of 1 die.

layout.name: ChicagoOutfit
layout.action_text: Must have: $4,000 to bribe the local boss or Mob experience.

layout.name: StorkClub
layout.action_text: Must have: A Member Card, or $10,000 for a new Member Card, or a Theatre degree

layout.name: DivorceCourt
layout.action_text: You and your partner split amicably. Throw 1 die to see how amicably. Pay number thrown times 10% of your annual salary

layout.name: JazzRecords
layout.action_text: Jazz recordings for sale. Score Happiness points as follows: 4 Hearts - $2,000; 8 Hearts - $8,000; 12 Hearts - $16,000

layout.name: RadioStationKWDB
layout.action_text: Must have: $5,000 for technical training, or an Engineering Degree, or radio broadcasting experience

layout.name: Publicity
layout.action_text: May hire Walter Winchell for good publicity. Score Fame points as follows: 4 Stars - $4,000, 10 Stars - $8,000, 16 stars - $12,000, 22 Stars - $16,000
